thread.title: Kailyn Lowry Admits ‘Naked Truth’ Amid Shocking Pregnancy!
thread.title_full: Kailyn Lowry Admits ‘Naked Truth’ Amid Shocking Pregnancy!

author: Teresa Roca
title: Kailyn Lowry Admits ‘Naked Truth’ Amid Shocking Pregnancy!
text:
Kailyn Lowry has denied her pregnancy for weeks, but is she finally ready to come clean? After RadarOnline.com exclusively confirmed the Teen Mom 2 star is pregnant with her third child, Lowry made a shocking confession on Twitter.
“ The naked truth is always better than someone’s best-dressed lie,” Lowry, 24, re-tweeted. She added, “Reclaiming my freedom. Reclaiming my happiness.”
Lowry’s ex-husband Javi Marroquin also responded to the bombshell.
“Ya’ll aren’t getting anything from me,” he told fans over Twitter. “It will all play out.”
PHOTOS: Date With Disaster: Rehab Grad Selena Rebounds With Druggie Singer The Weeknd! 
As readers know, multiple insiders close to the mother-of-two confirm to Radar that she’s pregnant with her third child .
The new addition will join big brother Isaac from Lowry’s relationship with ex-boyfriend Jo Rivera and Lincoln from her marriage to Marroquin.
During the Teen Mom after show earlier this month, she admitted that she would be open to having more children. A reason she divorced from Marroquin was because she didn’t want to have another baby with him.
Lowry’s fuller figure on social media and after shows also fueled rumors.
“Anyone else think Kail looks pregnant?” one user tweeted during a live special, as another asked, “Why does Kail look pregnant.”
PHOTOS: Over It! Kylie & Tyga On The Verge Of A Split 
The MTV star admitted over social media that she “did put on a little weight.”
Sources also confirm her baby daddy is the mystery man Marroquin caught in their home earlier this season.
“I texted her and said can I drop Lincoln off and she was like, ‘I’m at Walmart right now come in an hour,’” Marroquin said on the episode. “We pull up earlier since Kail’s car was there and we see another car I knock on the door, Lincoln goes in and I said, ‘Let me get my stuff’ and she won’t let me in. I’m like not leaving my son with another dude here, not happening .”
Lowry denied the pregnancy when asked by Radar.
